newsitem.title: USA: NYMEX to raise natgas futures margins Monday.
newsitem.headline: NYMEX to raise natgas futures margins Monday.

text.p: The New York Mercantile Exchange (NYMEX) said Friday it will increase the margins on its three natural gas futures contracts as of the close of business Monday, December 16.
Initial margins for Henry Hub gas futures will be raised to $4,300 from $3,800 for clearing members; to $4,730 from $4,180 for members; and to $5,805 from $5,130 for customers.
For Permian Basin futures, margins will be increased to $3,000 from $2,500 for clearing members; to $3,300 from $2,750 for members; and to $4,050 from $3,375 for customers.
For Alberta futures, margins will rise to $2,500 from $2,000 for clearing members; to $2,750 from $2,200 for members; and to $3,375 from $2,700 for customers.
